pullRequest.title: Add test for generation of seasons
pullRequest.bodyText:
A test has been added to show that this works. If it doesn't work, there are configuration errors.
Fixes #3637

commit.message: Add test for generation of seasons

nodes.bodyText: Why are you introducing a exception class from an other package name space instead of using or creating a new class in kitodo package name space?

afterCommit.message: Add test for generation of seasons
